metadata.title: CVE-2022-33127 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The function that calls the diff tool in Diffy 3.4.1 does not properlyhandle double quotes in a filename when run in a windows environment. Thisallows attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a crafted string.

criterions.comment: ruby-diffy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
